full_output.summary: I am an aspiring software engineer.

projects.name: Dancing Website
projects.description: Designed and implemented a front-end interface for a Dancing site using CSS and JavaScript. Performed a responsive layout that adjusts to different screen sizes using CSS. Applied JavaScript to execute dynamic functionality, such as play and stop dance selection through click, and user feedback.

projects.name: Jewelry-Management-System
projects.description: Built a website with HTML, CSS, jQuery, TypeScript Using Angular. Utilized CSS to create a responsive and visually appealing design for the user interface. Applied Typescript code to execute dynamic functionality, such as play and stop dance selection through click, and user feedback. Included new Features checkout page cart page etc.

projects.name: Student Attendance Management System
projects.description: Created a Responsive Student Attendance Management System. By Using Java GUI Created an interactive site which Solves the real time problem of Managing the Student Attendance.

projects.name: Food Ordering Website
projects.description: Developed Health Booking Application to book appointments with doctor or kind of specialist. Helps to manage our time efficiently and notify the appointment date in the portal. Stores the data using mongo and acts as real time application.

experiences.description: Gained hands-on experience in developing, implementing, and maintaining internal web applications. Gained good command over JavaScript. Learnt How to design Interactive Webpages and Websites.
